Class BattlePhaseModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • BattlePhaseModel

  • public class BattlePhaseModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The BattlePhaseModel class represents the game logic for the battle phase, managing interactions between the player's active creature and the enemy creature.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BattlePhaseModel(CreatureModel CCreatureModel, int nAreaNum, InventoryModel CInventoryModel)
      Constructor for the BattlePhaseModel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Performs an attack action during the battle phase.

      Attempts to capture the enemy creature during the battle phase.
      void decreaseTurns()
      Decreases the remaining turns in the battle phase.
      Creature getActive()
      Retrieves the player's active creature.
      boolean getCaptured()
      Checks if the enemy creature was captured.
      double getDamage()
      Retrieves the amount of damage dealt in the last attack.
      Creature getEnemy()
      Retrieves the enemy creature in the battle.
      int getTurns()
      Retrieves the remaining turns in the battle phase.
      void setActive(Creature CActive)
      Sets the player's active creature.

      • BattlePhaseModel

        public BattlePhaseModel(CreatureModel CCreatureModel,
                        int nAreaNum,
                        InventoryModel CInventoryModel)
        Constructor for the BattlePhaseModel.
        Parameters:
        CCreatureModel - The CreatureModel for creating enemy creatures.
        nAreaNum - The area number, used for creating an enemy creature.
        CInventoryModel - The InventoryModel for managing the player's creatures.

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        public boolean attack()
        Performs an attack action during the battle phase.
        Returns:
        True if the enemy creature is defeated, false otherwise.

      • capture

        public boolean capture()
        Attempts to capture the enemy creature during the battle phase.
        Returns:
        True if the capture is successful, false otherwise.

      • decreaseTurns

        public void decreaseTurns()
        Decreases the remaining turns in the battle phase.

      • getActive

        public Creature getActive()
        Retrieves the player's active creature.
        Returns:
        The active creature controlled by the player.

      • getEnemy

        public Creature getEnemy()
        Retrieves the enemy creature in the battle.
        Returns:
        The enemy creature encountered in battle.

      • getTurns

        public int getTurns()
        Retrieves the remaining turns in the battle phase.
        Returns:
        The number of turns remaining.

      • getCaptured

        public boolean getCaptured()
        Checks if the enemy creature was captured.
        Returns:
        True if the enemy creature was captured, false otherwise.

      • getDamage

        public double getDamage()
        Retrieves the amount of damage dealt in the last attack.
        Returns:
        The amount of damage dealt to the enemy creature.

      • setActive

        public void setActive(Creature CActive)
        Sets the player's active creature.
        Parameters:
        CActive - The new active creature for the player.
